title: Modules 101: how to avoid spaghetti, big balls of mud and houses of straw!
summary:
This introductory tutorial will teach you how to effectively use modules
and packages so your code is easier to read, test, package, deploy,
reuse and maintain.

We will cover the basics of structuring your code with modules and
packages, ways of using the import statement, how to document modules
and packages, and a number of tips to ensure your code is less likely to
end up a tangled mess that collapses when you need to modify or extend
it.

This talk is compatible with Python 2 and 3.
